| HistoryText             = '''Lightbringr''' was a band fronted by [[Alison Blaire (Earth-616)|Alison Blaire]], which promoted inclusion and acceptance within populations of genetic minorities, including [[Homo superior|Mutants]] and [[Inhumans (Inhomo supremis)|Inhumans]]. Their work was opposed by a group of mutant supremacists known as [[Mutant Action (Earth-616)|Mutant Action]].{{r|Dazzler: X-Song Vol 1 1}}
